long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verigreen enhances users' browsing experience by providing real-time sustainability information on a given website. 

Features:
- Displays clear sustainability certification indicators in your browser, providing visual assurance of a sustainable choice.
- Seamlessly integrates into your browser, providing uninterrupted browsing without compromising speed or performance.
- State-of-the-art verification protocols to validate and audit sustainable certifications.
- On-going monitoring for certificate expiration.
- Growing database of sustainable certificate verifications including B Corporations, EU Ecolabel Destinations and more!

How to use:
- Install and visit the Verigreen Website to register an account.
- Log-in and visit a website. If a sustainability certification has been verified for the website, the plug-in Icon will light up.
- Open the plugin to learn more about the sustainability certifications(s) and verification.

Frequently Asked Questions:
Is Verigreen Certificate Checker free to use?
We offer a 14-day basic free trial. For ongoing access, please upgrade your account.
